coreAttributes.name: diamond necklace
coreAttributes.description: A necklace consisting of a metal chain that's studded with dozens of diamonds.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before fastening the diamond necklace around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] diamond necklace, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] diamond necklace, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] diamond necklace, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
